newsitem.title: JAPAN: Fujitsu rises as investors buy laggards.
newsitem.headline: Fujitsu rises as investors buy laggards.

text.p: Fujitsu Ltd's shares rose in Wednesday morning trade as investors began to buy another high-tech stock that had lagged behind the market, brokers said.
As of 0133 GMT, the shares were up 20 yen at 1,470. Fujitsu was the most heavily traded issue on the first section of the Tokyo bourse at 2.44 million shares.
Due to uncertainties surrounding currencies and slack trade, investors were at a loss on what to do, brokers said.
"Yesterday it was Toshiba, today it is Fujitsu," a broker at a medium-sized brokerage said. "Investors are having a hard time trying to make up their minds on what to buy."
